{"step_by_step_thinking": "Renal agenesis refers to the absence or failure of development of one or both kidneys. It can be unilateral (affecting one kidney) or bilateral (affecting both kidneys). Renal agenesis is associated with a condition called oligohydramnios, which is a decrease in the amount of amniotic fluid surrounding the fetus. Oligohydramnios occurs because the kidneys play a crucial role in producing amniotic fluid. Therefore, the answer choice is D. Oligohydramnios.", "answer_choice": "D"}
